#!/bin/bash
# SCP: Secret Laboratory Install Script

# update package lists
echo "Updating package lists"
apt -y update

# install packages
echo "Installing packages"
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl
apt -y --no-install-recommends install ca-certificates
apt -y --no-install-recommends install jq
apt -y --no-install-recommends install lib32gcc1

# download steamcmd
cd /tmp
echo "Downloading SteamCMD"
curl -O http://media.steampowered.com/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
tar -xzvf steamcmd_linux.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd
echo "Extracted and installed SteamCMD"

# download scp server
echo "Downloading SCP server"
./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 700330 -beta linux validate +quit
echo "Finished downloading SCP server"

#grab latest multiadmin and servermod
cd /mnt/server/
# thanks to https://stackoverflow.com/a/29360657
curl -sSLO $(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/Grover-c13/MultiAdmin/releases/latest | \
  jq --raw-output '.assets[0] | .browser_download_url')

cd SCPSL_Data/Managed/

curl -sSLO $(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/Grover-c13/Smod2/releases/latest | \
  jq --raw-output '.assets[0] | .browser_download_url')
curl -sSLO $(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/Grover-c13/Smod2/releases/latest | \
  jq --raw-output '.assets[1] | .browser_download_url')
# thanks to https://stackoverflow.com/a/29360657
echo "Installed MultiAdmin and ServerMod"
cd /mnt/server
mkdir -p servers/server/
cp /mnt/server/MiscData/gameconfig_template.txt /mnt/server/servers/server/config_gameplay.txt
cp /mnt/server/MiscData/remoteadmin_template.txt /mnt/server/servers/server/config_remoteadmin.txt
touch /mnt/server/latest.log
echo "Finished installation"
